titles.title: For the relief of Irina V. Kotlova-Green and her son, Nikita Kotlov.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 9/10/2002--Introduced. Declares Irina Kotlova-Green and her son, Nikita Kotlov, to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act upon payment of the required visa fees.
